Articles.Content:
Updated to 0.25 and released on "add on releases" at http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99410-0-25-Art-of-reentry?p=1527442#post1527442

1x1m heat resistant panel with space shuttle tiles, 6.5m heat shield, 3.75m hs and a 1.25m huygens style heat shield

well thats useful
Thank you! Using the deadly reentry plugin makes this a must have!
Anything else on the horizon? Maybe other sizes or types of reentry protection?
Wow. That is glowing... So beautifully...

Anything else on the horizon? Maybe other sizes or types of reentry protection?

indeed there is, working on a stabilizer for long craft, long craft tend to flip around when reentering.

and fixed a issue with the shields collision mesh, should work properly now, suggest redownloading

proof of concept fins

Edited June 29, 2013 by Rareden

anyone know of a module command for the part.cfg that will ignore a percentage of the heat that it absorbs, the problem im finding with heatshields connected to pods is the shields will heat up and most of that heat will also be absorbed by the pod so your pod will end up melting, i need a thermal spacer basically.
Yeah, you need a spacer made from "we think it's safe" kasbestos. Enjoying the heatshields, very nice. It would be great to see them in more sizes
the current version of deadly reentry has a heat shield decoupler spacer

You mentioned something about a stablizer to keep the craft facing the right way on reentry this would be great!

My problem is with all heat shields, I put it on the command pod (top) still heaving engines on because most of the time I would like to take off again but during reentry the craft flips, engines take the brunt of the heat and explode... Along with everything else once it flips... So a stabalizer would be nice or... A shield you can some how place anywhere? I'm not sure if it's possible but would be nice!

3.75m standard heat shield and the IRIS heat shield. IRIS can be opened and closed at will, leaving it open during reentry will actually destroy your craft . having it open reduces drag(good for initial rocket takeoff) and parts can be placed through it in the vab. minimizing needles rocket length.

also a 1x1m structural panel like the stock ones but with space shuttle tiles to protect things.

These look very good. Why no 2.5m?

ill add the standard sizes soon, just wanted to release it and see how it does first

If they could take the place of DR heat shields I would download and replace those with these. Please make sure they fit. The 2.5m heatshield would need two varieties possibly, with one being made to fit the Mk 1-2 Pod.
